stories.title: Writing the Time: AM and PM or a.m. and p.m.?

stories.text:
In recent years the coverage and convenience of streaming services has improved hugely, but I still have terabytes of DVDs backed up which I'd love to explore and consume just as easily.

What are you using to store and enjoy your own movie collection?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you manage and consume movies etc.?
Ask HN: How would you build a web app in 2022?

Optimizing the code of Super Mario 64

The Beginning of the End of Putin? Why the Russian Army May (and Should) Revolt

stories.text:
Hi,

I browse HN daily on my smallish Pixel 4 XL phone. The font size of important DOM elements, including the "new" hyperlink, are so tiny that I often accidentally tap the wrong element.

Can we please update the style to more modern, Bootstrapesque standards for easier consumption on mobile devices?
stories.title: Ask HN: Can we make the font bigger for mobile view?
‘Can you hear me now?’ Study reveals why voices are raised on video calls
